name: Dead to Rights
description: The clock is ticking on Garth's interphasic machine, and he is suddenly surrounded. Who has the right to apprehend Garth: will it be the Romulans, the Ferengi, or a Section 31 agent who has appeared with top secret concerns? You must decide.
rules:
— Unique Romulan, Ferengi Alliance, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using Kirk, Chekov, Harris, Garth, or TOS Bridge Crew (TOS Spock, Chapel, Uhura, McCoy, Scotty, H. Sulu, Rand) will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
— Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Kirk, Chekov, Harris, Garth, or TOS Bridge Crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

screens.text: "I can only assume that my presence here was necessary because Garth of Izar is standing in front of me, and not imprisoned on Elba II as he should be. I don't know what has happened, but I have urgent business to return to. Lives hang in the balance! Explain this, someone!"

"The Romulans and the Ferengi are both here to apprehend Garth for crimes against each of them, while I have been sent by Section 31 to ensure Garth is returned to Elba II. For highly classified reasons, I must protect Eden, which Garth is searching for and must never find."

"I will shut down Garth's interphasic machine, Captain, but the phasing process may have gone too far. Meridian still might phase, at any time. Those of us who don't belong here need to leave soon, or we'll be trapped here for sixty years!"

"Thank you, Mister Chekov. Captain, I trust your decision on the matter. Award custody of Garth to whomever you see fit, as long as he can't escape again. I must return to Earth, to a specific place and time. Edith Keeler and my crew depend on it."
